alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Platte County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 03 at 3:29AM MST until January 04 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West to northwest winds 30 to 40 MPH with gusts up to 60 MPH possible. Patchy blowing snow. * WHERE...Central Laramie County into southern Platte County including Cheyenne, Chugwater, and Wheatland. * WHEN...11 PM MST this evening until 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. Patchy blowing snow may result in locally reduced visibilities.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Platte County
